patthana21.47:4.1: Nasāsavaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sāsavo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana21.47:5.1: Naanāsavaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sāsavo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana21.47:5.4: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.47:6.2: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … aññamaññe ekaṃ … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.47:7.1: Naanāsavaṃ naanidassanaappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sāsavo anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.47:7.3: Hetuyā ekaṃ, adhipatiyā ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
